sql.name: queryXhCarMessageList
sql.sqlString: select a.ASSESS_MONEY,/*评估金额*/ a.SUGGEST_MONEY,/*建议借款额*/ a.ASSESS_PERSON,/*评估师姓名*/ a.BREAK_RULES,/*违章及事故情况*/ a.ASSESS_FINISH,/*车辆评估报告结论*/ a.VISUAL_INSPECTION,/*外观监测*/ a.INSPECTION_FLAG,/*车年检情况(有无)*/ a.INSPECTION,/*车年检情况*/ a.TRAFFIC_INSURANCE_FLAG,/*交强险(有无)*/ a.TRAFFIC_INSURANCE,/*交强险*/ a.BUSINESS_INSURANCE_FLAG,/*商业险(有无)*/ a.BUSINESS_INSURANCE,/*商业险*/ a.CHASSIS_NUMBER,/*车架号*/ a.MADE_TIME,/*出厂日期*/ a.PLATE,/*车牌号码*/ a.REGISTER_TIME,/*登记日期*/ a.LABLE,/*车辆厂牌型号*/ a.ID from XH_CAR_MESSAGE a where 1=1 $sql
